name: Space Station KL1K
description:
Space Station KL-1000 (KL1K)

This was an old experiment to teach me how to use JavaScript, back in 2013.

It's a JavaScript/CSS/HTML only incremental game with about 20 minutes of 'real' gameplay. It gets pretty flat/dull later.

You'll be: 

  • Clicking the generator buttons
  • Buying generators for your space station
  • Hiring space station crew (with randomized names and personalities)
  • Doing research with the help of the endlessly cheerful robot ACE

The game is abandoned now, but I have uploaded it here to hopefully help others who also want to learn JavaScript to make their own games. I've labelled the files/sections quite carefully and there are lots of debug output print commands you can uncomment to watch how it runs.

Will open in fullscreen. Really only works at 1920 x 1080 or larger.
